comment: Soon as I start the game the Invaders drop to the bottom of the screen killing me. Fossil Q 3rd gen.  Unplayable.

author: Garret Glascock
comment: Contrary to the complaints of the ship getting stuck on one side or the other, it hasn't happened to me. Just tap the opposite side of the screen and the ship comes over. Yes, I have a Moto 360. Really cool to have a stand alone app that you can play on your watch!
title: Works for me

author: Terry. B.
comment: Dev : as you can see Most, if not almost All, of this game's users can't move the ship to stay alive. Please fix. Go back 1 version. We understand you're working to improve this and will be patient as long as we hear from you.
title: Can't Play my Favorite Watch Game Anymore.

author: Brian McGlothlin
comment: It's an ok game if you don't mind playing with your ship stuck on the right side of the screen! I could barely move it back once but for  the best rest of the play it stays stuck on the right. I'm using an LG Urbane watch and Galaxy 5S phone.
title: Can't move ship

author: Alan Wolcheski
comment: The watch app on the Moto 360, well kinda sucks. Slow movements of home base and the overall blah of the game make it a shallow remake of the original.  I know the original was on an Atari full sized machine... But this isn't even a time waster
title: Not really
